text:
#4QFY23 Financial Results: Our Consolidated Revenues for FY23 stood at ₹ 2,43,353 Cr., broadly similiar on YoY basis despite volatile operating environment across geographies. FY23 Consolidated EBITDA stood at ₹ 32,698 Cr. & Consolidated PAT stood at ₹ 8,075 Cr.

#TataSteel

text:
#3QFY23 Financial Results: Our consolidated revenues for the first 9 months of FY23 stood at ₹ 1,80,391 Cr. (3% Growth YoY) and consolidated EBITDA stood at ₹ 25,472 Cr. with an EBITDA margin of ~14% despite volatile operating environment across geographies.

#TataSteel
